mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board_notice( board_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer )
VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}) ;
mapper.select:
SELECT bn.board_no, bn.notice_title, bn.notice_writer, bb.board_reg_date, bb.board_mod_date, bb.board_view, bb.category_board
FROM board_notice bn LEFT JOIN base_board bb ON bn.board_no = bb.board_no
ORDER BY bn.board_no DESC
LIMIT 0, 10 ;
